Services

At BizTech Alliance Pro Company, we offer a wide range of IT services designed to meet the unique needs of businesses across various industries. Whether you're looking to streamline operations, enhance security, or drive innovation, our expert team has you covered.

  • Proactive Monitoring and Maintenance

    From proactive monitoring and maintenance to helpdesk support and IT strategy consulting, our Managed IT Services ensure your infrastructure runs smoothly and efficiently.

    View

  • Optimizing system performance

    Unlock the power of the cloud with our tailored cloud solutions, including cloud migration, management, and optimization services, to boost agility, scalability, and cost-efficiency.

  • Managed Endpoint Protection

    From proactive monitoring and maintenance to helpdesk support and IT strategy consulting, our Managed IT Services ensure your infrastructure runs smoothly and efficiently.

    View

  • Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) Services

    This service revolves around implementing and managing SIEM solutions that aggregate and analyze log data from various sources across the organization's IT infrastructure.

    View

  • Cloud Security Assessment and Compliance

    This service focuses on assessing and enhancing the security posture of cloud environments (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS).

    View

  • Disaster Recovery as a Service (DRaaS)

    This service provides a comprehensive disaster recovery solution that replicates critical systems and data to a secondary site or cloud environment.

    View

  • On-Premises Backup and Tape Archiving

    This service focuses on backing up data to on-premises storage systems and utilizing tape archiving solutions for long-term data retention.

    View

  • Continuous Data Protection (CDP) Solutions

    This service offers continuous backup and real-time replication of data to ensure near-zero recovery point objectives (RPOs) and recovery time objectives (RTOs).

    View
